sentences.sentence: Which takes us to some more bad years, the Commonwealth in England under Oliver Cromwell: long on sermons, short on fun, with maypoles and general frolicking severely frowned upon.
sentences.translation: 这让我们想起一些更糟糕的岁月，奥利弗·克伦威尔（Oliver Cromwell）统治下的英联邦：大道理很多，乐趣很少，五朔节花柱和寻常的嬉戏会引起强烈不满。
